column16: Fire-10        Leap at the foe's weak point.
Earth-10       Sneak behind the foe--and attack!
Air-10         Attack with an improvised weapon.
Water-10       Attack the foe in a creative fashion.
Fire-10        Lead a charge towards the foe.
Earth-10       Target the foe's head with a precise attack.
Air-10         Pay back the foe's misdeeds!
Water-10       Go wild on the foe.
Fire-10        Strike without fear of retribution.
Earth-10       Wait for an opening--then strike!
Air-10         Attack together with your Ego.
Water-10       Attack with a flaming blow.
